item.title: 113 Frontal v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 25, 2025

113 Frontal v1.0 ETS2

The user is asking about the 113 Frontal for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). This is a reference to the Scania 113H truck, specifically a mod that brings the classic “frontal” or “bicudo” version of this legendary vehicle into the game.

The Scania 113H is one of the most iconic trucks in the history of trucking, especially in Brazil and other parts of South America. The “Frontal” name distinguishes it from the cab-over-engine models, as it has a distinct hood and a more conventional, long-nose design.

What Makes the 113 Frontal Mod Special?
Mods like this are very popular because they provide a deeply nostalgic and authentic driving experience. A high-quality 113 Frontal mod for ETS2 will typically include:
Detailed Interior: A fully modeled and functional interior that accurately replicates the classic 113H dashboard and cabin.
Realistic Sounds: The mod often comes with its own engine sounds, recorded from the real truck, to capture the unique roar of the Scania 11-liter engine.
Customization: Players can usually customize the truck with different chassis options (like 4×2, 6×2, and 6×4), various engine and transmission choices, and a wide array of accessories.

Credits: MARCO BRASA

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MB 1933 v2.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 25, 2025

MB 1933 v2.0 ETS2

The Mercedes-Benz 1933 is a classic truck, and this mod aims to replicate its unique feel and look. Good versions of this mod typically feature:
Detailed Models : Both the exterior and interior are often meticulously modeled, with a focus on historical accuracy, from the classic dashboard to the truck’s signature front grille.
Realistic Sounds: One of the most important aspects of a high-quality truck mod is the sound. The V2 mod usually includes custom engine and air brake sounds that are unique to the real-life 1933.
Chassis and Customization : The mod often includes a variety of chassis options, such as 4×2 and 6×4, along with different engine and transmission choices. Players can also customize the truck with various paint jobs, lights, and accessories.
Compatibility: The V2 designation often means the mod has been updated to work with newer versions of ETS2, but it’s always a good practice to check if the specific mod you’re downloading is compatible with your game version.

Credits: PÃOZINHO

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: ACTROS MACAU 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 25, 2025

ACTROS MACAU 1.55 ETS2

When you mention ACTROS ETS2 MACAU, you’re likely referring to a YouTube creator named Macauuly do Ceasa, who makes content about the game Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), particularly featuring the Mercedes-Benz Actros truck.
Macauuly do Ceasa is known for creating and showcasing various mods for the game, including truck and map mods. He often features the Mercedes-Benz Actros, and his videos sometimes include links to download the mods he’s using.

Credits: MACAU

item.title: PACK 04 REBOQUES CURTOS AM29 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 25, 2025

PACK 04 REBOQUES CURTOS AM29 1.55 ETS2

When you mention “PACK 04 SHORT TRAILERS _ AM29 ETS2,” you’re referring to a trailer mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 created by a modder known as AM29.
Creator AM29 is well-known in the Brazilian ETS2 mod community and specializes in creating trailer mods, especially short trailers (the most common in Brazil), which are ideal for traffic and narrower roads.

Mod Features
This short trailer pack typically includes:
Variety of models: The pack contains four different types of trailers, such as two- or three-axle short trailers, which increases the fun and variety of tasks in the game.
Skins and cargo: The trailers often come with various skins from Brazilian companies and, in some cases, custom cargo.
Realism: The mod focuses on bringing greater realism to the game for those playing on Brazilian maps. Short trailers are more agile and handle differently than the game’s standard long trailers.

Credits: AM29

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
